topic.title: How to Style the Table of Contents Entries

body.p: You can change the font of the labels and aspect of the dots and page numbers from the table of contents. Each of the items from the table of contents is an element having the "map/topicref" class.In the following example we will use the italic font for the label and change the color and style of the connecting line between the title and the page number.
